text: If you are looking for trustworthy organic food and natural cosmetics, this store has it! They import from Germany! And German products are known for superb quality,. I love their oats and muesli, they have for kids and adults, we buy dried fruits and nuts, pasta, and their flour is excellent for baking (i make my own sourdough bread with their rye and wholewheat flour).
Organics best shop has high-quality products, and as important, has excellent customer service👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

Coming from Switzerland, I missed Bio organic products in Singapore until I found Bio Deutschland. I love their Dinkelpuffs, Decaf Coffee and think rice cakes. They are also cheaper than FairPrice, Redmart and Cold Storage. Will order again☺️☺️💚

just experienced the best in organic goodness at bio aus deutschland!! they’ve got pantry staples and treats you can’t get anywhere but here, find quality that fits your budget 🫡 don't sleep on this or even try to gatekeep it’s such a good find 😭🫶🏻
As a family of 4 this is the perfect breakfast shop! I love the muesli selection, our kids the herbal teas and my husband their spreads. Best way to start the day, hoping for more products!
